meanings.definition: The act of passing or going through something again.
meanings.sent1: After finishing the book, she enjoyed the repassages to relive the story.
meanings.sent2: During the hike, they took a few repassages through the scenic trail.
meanings.sent3: The repassages through the old photo album brought back many memories.
meanings.sent4: His mind felt like a maze with endless repassages of thoughts.
meanings.sent5: The repassages of the song lyrics helped her memorize them better.

meanings.definition: A section of a written work that is read or studied again.
meanings.sent1: The students focused on the repassages of the chapter before the exam.
meanings.sent2: The repassages of the poem revealed new meanings each time.
meanings.sent3: She found herself lost in the repassages of the thrilling novel.
meanings.sent4: The repassages of the play highlighted the recurring themes.
meanings.sent5: His favorite part of the book was the repassages of the final chapter.
